title: Double-Bell Rocket Stove
subtitle: Designed by pinhead
about:
A [rocket stove][1] mass heater is an innovative and efficient space
heating system. The following simulation is a double-bell model designed
by [pinhead][2]. (Author\'s original comment: \"This seems to be a
decently-accurate rendition of the bell system that I\'m currently using
in my RMH.\")



[1]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rocket_stove 
[2]: http://donkey32.proboards.com/index.cgi?action=viewprofile&user=pinhead
